Interface ArooaDescriptorFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArooaDescriptorBean, ArooaDescriptorDescriptorFactory, ClassPathDescriptorFactory, ClassResolverDescriptorFactory, ConfigurationDescriptorFactory, ListDescriptorBean, MagicBeanDescriptorFactory, OddballsDescriptorFactory, OddballsDirDescriptorFactory, OddjobDescriptorFactory, URLDescriptorFactory, VariablesJobDescriptorFactory

    public interface ArooaDescriptorFactory
    Something that can create an ArooaDescriptor.

    rob
